DOC.brief_summary: This research goal characterize social demographic profile , nutritional status , presence chronic non-transmissible disease food intake community health agent belong five family health unit east zone Sao Paulo City .
DOC.brief_title: The Nutritional Status Food Intake Community Health Agents
DOC.detailed_description: It 's descriptive , exploratory quantitative study develop among 88 individual .
DOC.criteria: Be agent comunnity health belong family health unit choose participate study ; Assign autorization participate study ; Answer questionary health , social demographic profile food intake . Refuse participate assign autorization ; Don´t answer questionary health food intake ; Don´t participate nutricional status evaluation .
DOC.keyword: Family Health Program ; Food consumption ; Nutritional status
